title: Pearl & Polki Kundan Jadau Choker: A Timeless 'Addigai' Style Necklace
features: This exquisite choker features a classic Addigai design with a contemporary twist. The central motif showcases a large Polki diamond in a delicate Kundan setting, enhanced with intricate gold filigree work. The design incorporates cascading drops of emerald and rose quartz beads, interspersed with lustrous natural pearls. The necklace is finished with a lobster clasp and adjustable chain for a comfortable fit. The pendant is adorned with Rubies that have been set around the center stone, adding a pop of color to this beautiful necklace.
occasions: Sankranti). Can also be worn for modern formal events.
description: This is a rare and exquisite piece, combining the timeless elegance of Kundan jewelry with a modern, wearable design. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds, natural pearls, and meticulously selected emeralds and rose quartz ensures lasting beauty and value. The traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship adds a touch of royalty and cultural significance. The adjustable chain makes it suitable for various neck sizes and styles. The pearls are carefully chosen for their lusture and color. Perfect as a bridal piece or a treasured heirloom.
